data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The picture shows a man trying to poke the letters on his signboard down using a thin pole. The man looks Caucasian by his hair color. He wears a navy jacket and a pair of black gloves. He may want to redecorate his shop. His shop looks old, and with a lot of posters stuck on the showcase. There is an electrical pole standing in front of his shop.
